title: FilmFinder
description: It is a Single-Page-Application where I utilized Redux for state management to ensure seamless application performance and integrated Axios to fetch data from an external API, displaying real-time information about trending movies

title: WatchCharm
description: Led a team in the WatchCharm project. Oversaw project deployment on GitHub, managed version control, and resolved merge conflicts, also enhanced website performance by optimizing images and minimizing CSS and JavaScript files

title: Portfolio website
description: Developed with team a responsive Portfolio website with features like dark mode toggle, and seamless integration with Local Storage for user preferences. Implemented a registration form with API integration for handling user submissions and ensuring secure data transfer

title: RadiantRecipes
description: I developed a Single-Page Application using Redux for state management and Axios for fetching real-time recipe data. The app ensures smooth performance and scalability, offering users an intuitive interface to explore recipes

title: PhoneBook
description: Developed a simple phonebook connected to a Swagger backend API, enabling users to sign up, log in, add, filter, and edit contacts, also implemented JWT for secure authorization and data protection

title: TaskCounter
description: TaskCounter â€“ a simple and efficient task management application. Add, edit, and delete your tasks, filter them by status (active or completed), and stay on top of your to-do list. With an intuitive interface, TaskCounter helps you plan effectively and achieve your goals
